title: Can You Draw These Failed 90’s Gaming Mascots? - Game Showdown
description:
Can Greg, Tim, and Andy accurately draw 90's platforming mascots based on their names?

Season 2 Ep .3

The Kinda Funny Membership gets you Ad-Free and Exclusive Shows: https://www.youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames/join
http://www.patreon.com/KindaFunny 

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Intro
00:01:30 - Housekeeping & First Question
00:07:40 - Portrait Mode Round 1
00:15:53 - Round 2
00:21:40 - Round 3
00:28:09 - Round 4
00:33:48 - Round 5
00:43:45 - Bonus Round
